channel.title: Announcement on The TechGlider
channel.description: Recent content in Announcement on The TechGlider

item.title: Welcome to the all new TechGlider!
item.description:
The aim of this GitHub site is to disseminate high quality content related to Computer Science, research, programming and general technology.

We have a GitHub organization for collaboration, a Twitter account for announcing updates and a Slack channel for discussion.

Stay tuned!
